metadata.title: CVE-2017-14632 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.5 allows Remote Code Execution upon freeinguninitialized memory in the function vorbis_analysis_headerout() in info.cwhen vi->channels<=0, a similar issue to Mozilla bug 550184.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14632` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvorbis0a - 1.3.2-1.3ubuntu1.1
libvorbisenc2 - 1.3.2-1.3ubuntu1.1
libvorbisfile3 - 1.3.2-1.3ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvorbis package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-1.3ubuntu1.1').
